title: SDK Android
content:
Set Proxy

```
[Project Folder]/platforms/android/gradle.properties
```
```
systemProp.http.proxyHost=41.223.119.156
systemProp.http.proxyPort=3128
systemProp.https.proxyHost=41.223.119.156
systemProp.https.proxyPort=3128
```

Unset Proxy

```
npm config rm proxy 
npm config rm https-proxy --tried removing npm proxy 
```

<hr>

```
touch /home/fitored/.android/repositories.cfg
```

```
sdkmanager --no_https --update
```

```
sdkmanager --no_https --list
```

```
sdkmanager "platforms;android-28" "build-tools;28.0.3" "system-images;android-28;google_apis_playstore;x86_64"
```

```
android list targets
```

```
android create avd -n <name> -k "xxx"
```

```
/home/fitored/Public/Android/sdk-tools-linux/tools/emulator -list-avds
```

<hr>

Android 11 Storage access:

`App_Resources/Android/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml`

```
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
```
